name: H&H
description:
Created and Develped by MAD GAMES, a collective formed by Felipe Hernandez and Javier Roldán, H&H follows the story of Jack, a lumberjack that dies after an unfortunate hunting accident, leaving his soul stuck between heaven and hell, and splitting his soul in two. As Jack gets to the gates of hell, his angelic side guides him to gather his lost soul bites, giving him the chance to retrive his life, and give our protagonist a second chance in live.

Controls:

- Movement: WASD

- Turning: E, Q

- Interacting: F

- Dialogue Advance: Left Mouse Click

- Pause: ESC
